org.apache.flink.runtime.util

类 JarFileCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.util.JarFileCreator

  • public class JarFileCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an auxiliary program which creates a jar file from a set of classes.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.lang.String CLASS_EXTENSION
      The file extension of java classes.
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> classSet
      A set of classes which shall be included in the final jar file.
      private java.io.File outputFile
      The final jar file.
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> packages
      The namespace of the dependencies to be packaged.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JarFileCreator(java.io.File outputFile)
      Constructs a new jar file creator.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      JarFileCreator addClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Adds a Class object to the set of classes which shall eventually be included in the jar file.
      private void addDependencies()
      Add the dependencies within the given packages automatically.
      JarFileCreator addPackage(java.lang.String p)
      Manually specify the package of the dependencies.
      JarFileCreator addPackages(java.lang.String[] packages)
      Manually specify the packages of the dependencies.
      void createJarFile()
      Creates a jar file which contains the previously added class.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JarFileCreator

        public JarFileCreator(java.io.File outputFile)
        Constructs a new jar file creator.
        参数:
        outputFile - the file which shall contain the output data, i.e. the final jar file

    • 方法详细资料

      • addClass

        public JarFileCreator addClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Adds a Class object to the set of classes which shall eventually be included in the jar file.
        参数:
        clazz - the class to be added to the jar file.

      • addPackage

        public JarFileCreator addPackage(java.lang.String p)
        Manually specify the package of the dependencies.
        参数:
        p - the package to be included.

      • addPackages

        public JarFileCreator addPackages(java.lang.String[] packages)
        Manually specify the packages of the dependencies.
        参数:
        packages - the packages to be included.

      • addDependencies

        private void addDependencies()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Add the dependencies within the given packages automatically.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw if an error occurs while read the class file.

      • createJarFile

        public void createJarFile()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a jar file which contains the previously added class. The content of the jar file is written to outputFile which has been provided to the constructor. If outputFile already exists, it is overwritten by this operation.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while writing to the output file
